translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 2軍将軍であるボドゥが死亡した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bodo, the general of the 2nd army, has died.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵の実数を見誤ったのが原因の痛手であった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a heavy blow caused by underestimating the enemy's actual numbers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 将を失い混乱に陥りかける2軍を立て直したのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The one who rebuilt the 2nd army, which was about to fall into chaos after losing its commander,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 副将トルストイだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was Vice General Tolstoy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、今も尚、ここで2軍を率い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And even now, he leads the 2nd army here

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長い戦いに明け暮れ続けている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: continuing endlessly through the long battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「開戦から五ヶ月か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's been five months since the start of the war..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トルストイの人生の中で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In Tolstoy's life,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは最も長い五ヶ月であった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: these were the longest five months.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一日たりとて無駄に出来る日も、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not a single day could be wasted,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 油断できる日もなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: nor was there any day to let down their guard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 常に神経を張り巡らせ、頭を回し続け、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Always on high alert, constantly thinking,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 臆することなく戦闘に出て傷を負い続け、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: fearlessly going into battle and continuing to be wounded,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでようやく得られた五ヶ月という日数である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that was how they managed to hold on for those five months.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしも、ただ一日でもおろそかにすれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If even a single day was neglected,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 番裏の砦は陥落し、瞬く間に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the fort at the rear would fall, and in the blink of an eye,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンは占領されていたことだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Helman would have been occupied.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その長きに渡る戦いも終わりが近づいていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The end of that long battle was drawing near.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「トルストイ副将。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Vice General Tolstoy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現在の兵数、五千を割りました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The current number of soldiers has dropped below five thousand."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「10万人いたここも、随分寂しくなったものだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This place that once had 100,000 troops has become quite desolate."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トルストイは眼下の魔物界を見据えながら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tolstoy stared down at the demon realm beneath him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこか他人事のように呟いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and muttered as if it were someone else's matter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「味方は敵の吸血により、操られ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Our allies have been controlled through the enemy's bloodsucking...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵の手駒へと姿を変えました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and have turned into pawns of the enemy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「連日の魔物側からの猛攻に耐えるのも……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Enduring the demon side's relentless assaults day after day...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう、せいぜい二日か、三日か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we can hold out only another two or three days at best..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ならばいっそ、ラング・バウに逃げるか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then perhaps we should just retreat to Lang Bau..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それが無理なら、せめて一矢報いる為、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If that’s impossible, then at least to retaliate with a single shot,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特攻をさせてください！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: please allow me to carry out a suicide attack!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……今、なんと言った？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...What did you just say?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 飢えた獣のような眼光、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His gaze was like that of a starving beast,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵もさすがに怯んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and even the soldiers faltered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「死ぬのも、逃げるのも、許さん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I will not allow dying, nor fleeing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我々がここで一日でも長く戦えば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If we fight even one day longer here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは故郷の家族が安全に過ごせる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it means that families back home can live safely

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴重な一日を守ったということ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: protecting that precious day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我らがここで戦う意味はあるのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There is meaning in our fighting here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「歯を食いしばり戦い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Grit your teeth and fight,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 耐えがたきに耐え、忍びがたきを忍び――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: endure the unbearable, bear the intolerable—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「――それから死ぬのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —and then die."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よいな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Understood?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「申し訳ありません、副将……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm sorry, Vice General..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （馬鹿言うなよ……俺だって逃げたいよ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Don't be stupid... I want to run away too...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰が好きこのんでこんな場所で戦うかよ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Who would choose to fight in a place like this...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （逃げて逃げて逃げて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Run away, run away, run away...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 故郷の嫁さんと娘を抱きしめて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hold my wife and daughter back home...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それで全て忘れて眠れたらどれだけ幸せか……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How happy would I be to forget everything and sleep like that...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （それが無理ならいっそ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (If that’s impossible, then even so,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺だって戦って死んで楽になりてぇよ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to fight and die to find peace...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （神経削りながら、腹減らしながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Straining my nerves, starving,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 毎日毎日魔物と無茶な戦いをして……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: fighting impossible battles against demons every single day...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭がどうにかなりそうだ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I feel like I’m losing my mind...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （特攻、特攻、特攻してぇなぁ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (I want to do a suicide attack, suicide attack, suicide attack...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――貧乏くじだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —What a rotten luck.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トルストイは心中で毒づいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tolstoy muttered bitterly in his heart.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――ボドゥ、恨むぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —Bodo, I blame you.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

I want to run away too..."},{"lineNumber":152868,"originalJapaneseLine":"　誰が好きこのんでこんな場所で戦うかよ……）","translatedEnglishLine":"Who would choose to fight in a place like this...)"},{"lineNumber":152869,"originalJapaneseLine":"（逃げて逃げて逃げて……","translatedEnglishLine":"(Run away, run away, run away..."},{"lineNumber":152870,"originalJapaneseLine":"　故郷の嫁さんと娘を抱きしめて……","translatedEnglishLine":"Hold my wife and daughter back home..."},{"lineNumber":152871,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それで全て忘れて眠れたらどれだけ幸せか……）","translatedEnglishLine":"How happy would I be to forget everything and sleep like that...)"},{"lineNumber":152872,"originalJapaneseLine":"（それが無理ならいっそ、","translatedEnglishLine":"(If that’s impossible, then even so,"},{"lineNumber":152873,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺だって戦って死んで楽になりてぇよ……）","translatedEnglishLine":"I want to fight and die to find peace...)"},{"lineNumber":152874,"originalJapaneseLine":"（神経削りながら、腹減らしながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"(Straining my nerves, starving,"},{"lineNumber":152875,"originalJapaneseLine":"　毎日毎日魔物と無茶な戦いをして……","translatedEnglishLine":"fighting impossible battles against demons every single day..."},{"lineNumber":152876,"originalJapaneseLine":"　頭がどうにかなりそうだ……）","translatedEnglishLine":"I feel like I’m losing my mind...)"},{"lineNumber":152877,"originalJapaneseLine":"（特攻、特攻、特攻してぇなぁ……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(I want to do a suicide attack, suicide attack, suicide attack...)"},{"lineNumber":152878,"originalJapaneseLine":"――貧乏くじだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"—What a rotten luck."},{"lineNumber":152879,"originalJapaneseLine":"トルストイは心中で毒づいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Tolstoy muttered bitterly in his heart."},{"lineNumber":152880,"originalJapaneseLine":"――ボドゥ、恨むぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"—Bodo, I blame you."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 2軍将軍であるボドゥが死亡した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bodo, the general of the 2nd army, has died.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵の実数を見誤ったのが原因の痛手であった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a heavy blow caused by underestimating the enemy's actual numbers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 将を失い混乱に陥りかける2軍を立て直したのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The one who rebuilt the 2nd army, which was about to fall into chaos after losing its commander,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 副将トルストイだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was Vice General Tolstoy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、今も尚、ここで2軍を率い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And even now, he leads the 2nd army here

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長い戦いに明け暮れ続けている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: continuing endlessly through the long battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「開戦から五ヶ月か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's been five months since the start of the war..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トルストイの人生の中で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In Tolstoy's life,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは最も長い五ヶ月であった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: these were the longest five months.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一日たりとて無駄に出来る日も、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not a single day could be wasted,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 油断できる日もなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: nor was there any day to let down their guard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 常に神経を張り巡らせ、頭を回し続け、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Always on high alert, constantly thinking,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 臆することなく戦闘に出て傷を負い続け、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: fearlessly going into battle and continuing to be wounded,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでようやく得られた五ヶ月という日数である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that was how they managed to hold on for those five months.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしも、ただ一日でもおろそかにすれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If even a single day was neglected,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 番裏の砦は陥落し、瞬く間に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the fort at the rear would fall, and in the blink of an eye,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンは占領されていたことだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Helman would have been occupied.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その長きに渡る戦いも終わりが近づいていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The end of that long battle was drawing near.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「トルストイ副将。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Vice General Tolstoy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現在の兵数、五千を割りました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The current number of soldiers has dropped below five thousand."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「10万人いたここも、随分寂しくなったものだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This place that once had 100,000 troops has become quite desolate."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トルストイは眼下の魔物界を見据えながら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tolstoy stared down at the demon realm beneath him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこか他人事のように呟いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and muttered as if it were someone else's matter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「味方は敵の吸血により、操られ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Our allies have been controlled through the enemy's bloodsucking...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵の手駒へと姿を変えました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and have turned into pawns of the enemy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「連日の魔物側からの猛攻に耐えるのも……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Enduring the demon side's relentless assaults day after day...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう、せいぜい二日か、三日か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we can hold out only another two or three days at best..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ならばいっそ、ラング・バウに逃げるか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then perhaps we should just retreat to Lang Bau..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それが無理なら、せめて一矢報いる為、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If that’s impossible, then at least to retaliate with a single shot,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特攻をさせてください！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: please allow me to carry out a suicide attack!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……今、なんと言った？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...What did you just say?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 飢えた獣のような眼光、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His gaze was like that of a starving beast,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵もさすがに怯んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and even the soldiers faltered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「死ぬのも、逃げるのも、許さん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I will not allow dying, nor fleeing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我々がここで一日でも長く戦えば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If we fight even one day longer here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは故郷の家族が安全に過ごせる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it means that families back home can live safely

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴重な一日を守ったということ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: protecting that precious day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我らがここで戦う意味はあるのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There is meaning in our fighting here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「歯を食いしばり戦い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Grit your teeth and fight,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 耐えがたきに耐え、忍びがたきを忍び――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: endure the unbearable, bear the intolerable—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「――それから死ぬのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —and then die."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よいな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Understood?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「申し訳ありません、副将……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm sorry, Vice General..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （馬鹿言うなよ……俺だって逃げたいよ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Don't be stupid... I want to run away too...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰が好きこのんでこんな場所で戦うかよ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Who would choose to fight in a place like this...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （逃げて逃げて逃げて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Run away, run away, run away...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 故郷の嫁さんと娘を抱きしめて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hold my wife and daughter back home...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それで全て忘れて眠れたらどれだけ幸せか……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How happy would I be to forget everything and sleep like that...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （それが無理ならいっそ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (If that’s impossible, then even so,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺だって戦って死んで楽になりてぇよ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to fight and die to find peace...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （神経削りながら、腹減らしながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Straining my nerves, starving,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 毎日毎日魔物と無茶な戦いをして……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: fighting impossible battles against demons every single day...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭がどうにかなりそうだ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I feel like I’m losing my mind...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （特攻、特攻、特攻してぇなぁ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (I want to do a suicide attack, suicide attack, suicide attack...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――貧乏くじだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —What a rotten luck.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トルストイは心中で毒づいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tolstoy muttered bitterly in his heart.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――ボドゥ、恨むぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —Bodo, I blame you.
